text: O vy, kotoryye uverovali, zashchitite sebya istinnoy veroy i ne sleduyte po stopam shaytana, kotoryy vedot vas k rasprostraneniyu merzosti i grekhov. Tot, kto sleduyet po stopam shaytana, oslushivayetsya Allakha, ibo shaytan povelevayet velikiye grekhi i gnusnost'. Yesli by ne blagovoleniye Allakha i Yego miloserdiye k vam, - ved' eto On raz"yasnil vam nastavleniya i zakony i prinyal pokayaniye nepovinuyushchikhsya Yemu, - ni odin iz vas nikogda by ne byl ochishchen ot grekha oslushaniya i nepovinoveniya. Odnako Allakh ochishchayet togo, kto po Yego dozvoleniyu povinuyetsya Yemu i otstranyayetsya ot grekhov, ili Allakh proshchayet yego posle pokayaniya. Poistine, Allakh - slyshit i znayet vsyakuyu veshch', i vozdast vam za eto
